Text.Page:
Windwhistle Woods has long been home to the fangspawns. Though massive and dangerous, there's always a balance.

Now the {@LinkCreature:29#1041#woodland fangspawns} are mad and threaten allâ€”including the forest! Need your help to kill them, . Gear up and get killing. Done talking now.

The fangspawn deaths were unavoidable. Otherwise this place would have to be called Devastation Woods.

You were very helpful. Will remember in future. Send letter of commendation.
